Occupation History:
Knudsen Gundersen Hansen is a 55 year old Tech Industry Leader from Denmark. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At SAP Danmark A/S, Knudsen Gundersen Hansen held the position of Software Developer from 1994 to 1999, developing essential skills in the field.
At IBM Danmark A/S, he held the position of Startup Founder from 1999 to 2001, making significant contributions to the organization.
He spent 5 years working as a CEO at Trifork A/S, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
His next role was as a Venture Capitalist at Trifork A/S, where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2007 to 2012.
Currently, he serves as a Tech Industry Leader at SAP Danmark A/S, continuing to make meaningful contributions to the industry since 2012.
